trans-unit.source: Reads XAML input and creates an object graph, using the WPF default XAML reader and an associated XAML object writer.
trans-unit.target: 读取 XAML 输入并创建使用 WPF 默认 XAML 读取器和一个关联的 XAML 对象编写器的对象图。

trans-unit.source: The synchronous <xref:System.Windows.Markup.XamlReader.Load%2A> methods are static, but the asynchronous <xref:System.Windows.Markup.XamlReader.LoadAsync%2A> methods are not static and require an instance of the XamlReader class to use.
trans-unit.target: 同步<xref:System.Windows.Markup.XamlReader.Load%2A>方法是静态的但异步<xref:System.Windows.Markup.XamlReader.LoadAsync%2A>方法不是静态的需要用的 xamlreader 形式提供类的实例。</xref:System.Windows.Markup.XamlReader.LoadAsync%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Markup.XamlReader.Load%2A>

trans-unit.source: The output of the `Load` methods is a single object, which represents the root object of a created object tree or object graph.
trans-unit.target: 输出`Load`方法是单个对象，它表示创建的对象树或对象图的根对象。

trans-unit.source: Object graphs that are created by XamlReader are typically added to the existing object tree of a WPF application at run time.
trans-unit.target: 由 xamlreader 形式提供的对象图通常添加到 WPF 应用程序在运行时的现有对象树中。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise the new object graph is considered disconnected for purposes of the WPF application model.
trans-unit.target: 否则新的对象图，被视为出于的 WPF 应用程序模型断开连接。

trans-unit.source: This means that it does not render, and cannot be accessed using any of the object tree techniques as applied to the WPF application's main object tree (for example, the APIs <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.FindName%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.LogicalTreeHelper>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.VisualTreeHelper>).
trans-unit.target: 也就是说，不会呈现，并且不能访问使用任一对象树技巧作为应用于 WPF 应用程序的主对象树 (例如，Api <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.FindName%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.LogicalTreeHelper>， <xref:System.Windows.Media.VisualTreeHelper>)。</xref:System.Windows.Media.VisualTreeHelper> </xref:System.Windows.LogicalTreeHelper> </xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.FindName%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information on object tree concepts, see [Trees in WPF](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 在对象树概念的详细信息，请参阅[WPF 中的树](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: XamlReader supports the following primary scenarios: - **Cloning/object factory**: Without additional mechanisms, a reference type generally cannot be included in more than one position in a WPF object tree.
trans-unit.target: Xamlreader 形式提供支持以下主要方案:-**克隆/对象工厂**︰ 没有附加机制，引用类型通常不能包含 WPF 对象树中的多个位置。

trans-unit.source: (Examples of additional mechanisms that offer support for sharing or re-use in WPF include objects that are based on <xref:System.Windows.Freezable>, or support for commonly shareable objects such as <xref:System.Windows.Media.Brush> that are referenced as an item from a <xref:System.Windows.ResourceDictionary>.) One way to clone an object that is already in the object tree is to serialize the object using <xref:System.Windows.Markup.XamlWriter.Save%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: (其他机制来提供对共享支持或在 WPF 中重新使用的示例包括基于的对象<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>，或如支持通常可共享对象<xref:System.Windows.Media.Brush>，引用为中的一个项<xref:System.Windows.ResourceDictionary>。)</xref:System.Windows.ResourceDictionary> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Brush> </xref:System.Windows.Freezable>要克隆的对象是已经在对象树中的一种方法是使用<xref:System.Windows.Markup.XamlWriter.Save%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Windows.Markup.XamlWriter.Save%2A?displayProperty=fullName>将对象序列化

trans-unit.source: You then use the serialized string as input for a call to <xref:System.Windows.Markup.XamlReader.Load%2A>, with a stream or <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader> as an intermediary.
trans-unit.target: 然后将其序列化的字符串作为输入用于调用<xref:System.Windows.Markup.XamlReader.Load%2A>，并将流或<xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>作为中介。</xref:System.Xml.XmlReader> </xref:System.Windows.Markup.XamlReader.Load%2A>

trans-unit.source: - **Constructing objects based on just-in-time information**: There are often other ways to have late-binding or user-supplied input change the state of existing objects.
trans-unit.target: -**构造对象基于在实时信息**︰ 通常还有其他方法来使用晚期绑定或用户提供的输入来更改现有对象的状态。

trans-unit.source: For example you could use the same value to set more than one property, or use data binding.
trans-unit.target: 例如你无法使用相同的值来设置多个属性，或使用数据绑定。

trans-unit.source: But if you have a scenario where even the type of object to create is only determinable at run time or with user interaction, then creating such an object by building up a string for <xref:System.Windows.Markup.XamlReader.Load%2A> input is often a useful technique.
trans-unit.target: 但如果你有其中甚至要创建的对象的类型为仅可确定在运行时或与用户交互的方案，然后通过在生成的字符串来创建此类对象<xref:System.Windows.Markup.XamlReader.Load%2A>输入通常是有用的技术。</xref:System.Windows.Markup.XamlReader.Load%2A>

trans-unit.source: - **Using existing resource techniques**: The <xref:System.IO.Stream> type is used frequently in other frameworks or technologies for transferring data or objects across application boundaries or for similar situations.
trans-unit.target: -**使用现有资源技术**:<xref:System.IO.Stream>类型常用于其他框架或技术用于跨应用程序边界传输数据或对象或类似情况。</xref:System.IO.Stream>

trans-unit.source: You can then use the <xref:System.IO.Stream> techniques to store or obtain XAML-formatted data that you eventually use to create an object as part of your application.
trans-unit.target: 然后，可以使用<xref:System.IO.Stream>技术来存储或获取最终用于你的应用程序的一部分中创建对象的 XAML 格式的数据。</xref:System.IO.Stream>

trans-unit.source: - **Fixed documents:** Your application might load local or downloaded XPS documents for inclusion in a WPF application object tree and UI.
trans-unit.target: -**固定文档︰**你的应用程序可能会加载以包含在 WPF 应用程序对象树和 UI 中的本地或下载 XPS 文档。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > This documentation sometimes describes an object graph, as opposed to an object tree.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> 有时本文档描述对象图，而不是对象树。

trans-unit.source: A strict parent-child relationship does not always exist in the run time object relationships of a run time WPF application, so an object graph is a more widely applicable terminology.
trans-unit.target: 严格的父-子关系不始终存在中运行的时 WPF 应用程序的运行的时对象关系，因此对象图是更广泛适用的术语。

trans-unit.source: However, because WPF also includes two different tree conceptualization APIs (<xref:System.Windows.LogicalTreeHelper>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.VisualTreeHelper>) the tree metaphor still applies adequately to most real-world cases in WPF.
trans-unit.target: 但是，原因是 WPF 还包括两个不同的树概念化 Api (<xref:System.Windows.LogicalTreeHelper>， <xref:System.Windows.Media.VisualTreeHelper>) 树隐喻仍充分地应用到 WPF 中的大多数现实情况。</xref:System.Windows.Media.VisualTreeHelper> </xref:System.Windows.LogicalTreeHelper>

trans-unit.source: From the XAML language perspective however, the object graph is often the best way to think about how objects are created out of XAML, because the XAML language itself does not necessarily specify helper class methodologies that bring the relationships more into a tree structure again.
trans-unit.target: 但是，从 XAML 语言角度来看对象图通常是最佳的方式考虑如何将对象创建超出 XAML 中，因为 XAML 语言本身并不一定指定关系带入树状结构再次显示的帮助器类方法。

trans-unit.source: Code Access Security, Loose XAML, and XamlReader XAML is a markup language that directly represents object instantiation and execution.
trans-unit.target: 代码访问安全性、 宽松 XAML 和 xamlreader 形式提供 XAML 是一种直接表示对象实例化和执行标记语言。

trans-unit.source: Therefore, elements created in XAML have the same ability to interact with system resources (network access, file system IO, for example) as the equivalent generated code does.
trans-unit.target: 因此，在 XAML 中创建的元素具有相同能够作为生成的等效项 （例如网络访问，文件系统 IO） 的系统资源与之交互代码执行的操作。

trans-unit.source: [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] supports the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_net](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-net-md.md)] security framework [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_cas](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-cas-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]支持[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_net](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-net-md.md)]安全框架[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_cas](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-cas-md.md)]。

trans-unit.source: This means that [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] content running in the internet zone has reduced execution permissions.
trans-unit.target: 这意味着，[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]内容 internet 区域中运行具有较少的执行权限。

trans-unit.source: "Loose XAML" (pages of noncompiled XAML interpreted at load time by a XAML viewer) and [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xbap](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-xbap-md.md)] are usually run in this internet zone and use the same permission set.
trans-unit.target: "松散 XAML"（按未编译的 XAML 页解释在加载时通过 XAML 查看器） 和[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xbap](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-xbap-md.md)]通常运行此 internet 区域中，并使用相同的权限集。

trans-unit.source: However, XAML loaded in to a fully trusted application has the same access to the system resources as the hosting application does.
trans-unit.target: 但是，XAML 中加载到完全信任的应用程序与托管的应用程序具有对系统资源的相同访问权限。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [WPF Partial Trust Security](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[WPF 部分信任安全](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: The implications of these statements for XamlReader is that your application design must make trust decisions about the XAML you decide to load.
trans-unit.target: Xamlreader 形式提供这些语句的含义是应用程序设计必须做出决定加载有关 XAML 的信任决定。

trans-unit.source: If you are loading XAML that is not trusted, consider implementing your own sandboxing technique for how you load the resulting object graph.
trans-unit.target: 如果你要将加载不受信任的 XAML，请考虑实现你自己的沙盒技术来加载生成的对象图的方式。

trans-unit.source: XamlReader can also be called by partial trust code.
trans-unit.target: 此外可以由部分信任代码调用 xamlreader 形式提供。

trans-unit.source: In this case, Internet security zone is applied for code access security.
trans-unit.target: 在这种情况下，Internet 安全区域被应用于代码访问安全性。

trans-unit.source: If anything in the loaded XAML is invalid under Internet security zone, a XAML parse exception is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 如果加载的 XAML 中的任何内容无效 Internet 安全区域下，会引发一个 XAML 分析异常。

trans-unit.source: Under XBAP and other cases that are partial trust at the platform level, where XamlReader is part of the execution, you get the same exception behavior as with explicit partial trust calls.
trans-unit.target: XBAP 和是部分信任级别的平台，其中 xamlreader 形式提供是执行过程的一部分，其他情况下，可以使用显式的部分信任调用相同的异常行为。

trans-unit.source: WPF XAML, XAML Readers/Writers, and XAML Language Versioning [!INCLUDE[xaml2009](~/add/includes/xaml2009-md.md)] includes language features such as and .
trans-unit.target: WPF XAML、 XAML 读取器/编写器，和 XAML 语言版本控制[!INCLUDE[xaml2009](~/add/includes/xaml2009-md.md)]包括语言功能，如和。

trans-unit.source: You can use signatures of `Load` or `Parse` to load XAML that uses these features.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用的签名`Load`或`Parse`来加载使用这些功能的 XAML。

trans-unit.source: However, those language features are not supported for XAML that needs to be markup compiled (such as XAML for the **Page** build action in a WPF application, or any XAML that involves the markup compile task in the build actions).
trans-unit.target: 但是，这些语言功能不支持针对需要标记编译的 XAML (如 XAML**页**生成 WPF 应用程序或涉及的生成操作中的标记编译任务任何 XAML 中的操作)。

trans-unit.source: WPF types and the WPF technology in general support concepts that rely on access to WPF internals.
trans-unit.target: WPF 类型和 WPF 技术通常支持依赖于对 WPF 内部结构的访问的概念。

trans-unit.source: For instance, how WPF implements dependency properties relies on internal techniques for efficient type-member lookup.
trans-unit.target: 例如，WPF 如何实施依赖项属性依赖于用于高效的类型成员查找内部技术。

trans-unit.source: Access to these internals is enabled by the XAML reading and writing APIs provided in <xref:System.Windows.Markup.XamlWriter> and XamlReader from the <xref:System.Windows.Markup> namespace and PresentationFramework assembly.
trans-unit.target: 对这些内部结构的访问通过读取和写入中提供的 Api 的 XAML<xref:System.Windows.Markup.XamlWriter>和 xamlreader 形式提供从<xref:System.Windows.Markup>命名空间和 PresentationFramework 程序集中。</xref:System.Windows.Markup> </xref:System.Windows.Markup.XamlWriter>

trans-unit.source: However, the lower-level XAML readers and XAML writers from the System.Xaml assembly (classes based on <xref:System.Xaml.XamlReader?displayProperty=fullName>, <xref:System.Xaml.XamlWriter?displayProperty=fullName>) do not have access to the WPF internals.
trans-unit.target: 但是，较低级别 XAML 读取器和 XAML 编写器从 System.Xaml 程序集 (类基于<xref:System.Xaml.XamlReader?displayProperty=fullName>， <xref:System.Xaml.XamlWriter?displayProperty=fullName>) 不能访问到 WPF 内部结构。</xref:System.Xaml.XamlWriter?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Xaml.XamlReader?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: There is no dependency from System.Xaml to any WPF-specific assembly.
trans-unit.target: 从 System.Xaml 对任何特定于 WPF 程序集没有依赖关系。

trans-unit.source: Without access to the WPF internals, System.Xaml readers and writers cannot correctly load or save all WPF types, or types based on WPF types.
trans-unit.target: 无需 WPF 内部访问，System.Xaml 读取器和编写器无法正确加载或保存所有 WPF 类型基于 WPF 类型。

trans-unit.source: In particular, the System.Xaml readers and writers do not understand concepts such as the WPF dependency property backing property store, or all the specifics of how WPF uses styles, resource dictionaries and templates.
trans-unit.target: 具体而言，System.Xaml 读取器和编写器不了解概念，如备份属性存储或 WPF 如何使用样式、 资源字典和模板的所有详细信息的 WPF 依赖项属性。

trans-unit.source: Therefore you have a choice to make: - If you are loading WPF types, and/or you are using XAML in BAML form in any way, use the PresentationFramework XAML readers and XAML writers.
trans-unit.target: 因此，你必须进行的选择:-如果要加载 WPF 类型和/或以任何方式的 BAML 形式使用 XAML 使用 PresentationFramework XAML 读取器和 XAML 编写器。

trans-unit.source: - If you are not relying on any WPF types or the BAML form of XAML, and are not using another specific technology's XAML reader or XAML writer implementation for reasons that are specific to that framework, use the System.Xaml XAML readers and XAML writers.
trans-unit.target: -如果你不依赖于任何 WPF 类型或 BAML 形式的 XAML，并不将另一种特定技术的 XAML 读取器或 XAML 编写器实现的原因，特定于该框架，则使用 System.Xaml XAML 读取器和 XAML 编写器。

trans-unit.source: System.Xaml Backing Implementation in .NET 4 XamlReader is the callable API surface for the WPF framework-level XAML parser.
trans-unit.target: System.Xaml 中.NET 4 xamlreader 形式提供的支持实现是 WPF 框架级别 XAML 分析器可调用的 API 图面。

trans-unit.source: The same underlying XAML parser also performs the run-time XAML loading and parsing for WPF applications that target [!INCLUDE[net_v30_short](~/add/includes/net-v30-short-md.md)] and [!INCLUDE[net_v35_short](~/add/includes/net-v35-short-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: 相同的基础 XAML 分析器还执行运行时 XAML 加载和分析 WPF 应用程序面向[!INCLUDE[net_v30_short](~/add/includes/net-v30-short-md.md)]和[!INCLUDE[net_v35_short](~/add/includes/net-v35-short-md.md)]。

trans-unit.source: If you are targeting [!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/add/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)], the external API is the same, but parts of the implementation are built on the [!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/add/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)] general XAML implementation in the System.Xaml assembly, which improves many of the technical and reporting aspects of parsing XAML.
trans-unit.target: 如果你正面向[!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/add/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)]、 外部 API 相同，但实施部分都基于[!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/add/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)]在 System.Xaml 程序集中，从而提高了许多分析 XAML 的技术和报告的方面的常规 XAML 实现。

trans-unit.source: Targeting [!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/add/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)] necessarily entails including System.Xaml as a reference, and details of implementation such as the exceptions reported may come from System.Xaml defined types.
trans-unit.target: 面向[!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/add/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)]一定需要一个引用，以及实现的详细信息包括 System.Xaml，如报告的异常可能来自于 System.Xaml 定义的类型。

trans-unit.source: ## XAML Text Usage
trans-unit.target: # # XAML 文本用法

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Markup.XamlReader"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Windows.Markup.XamlReader"></xref>类。

trans-unit.source: Aborts the current asynchronous load operation, if there is an asynchronous load operation pending.
trans-unit.target: 中止当前的异步加载操作中，如果没有挂起的异步加载操作。

trans-unit.source: CancelAsync is an asynchronous operation; therefore, some loading may occur before the operation is aborted.
trans-unit.target: CancelAsync 是一个异步操作;因此，操作中止之前，可能会出现某些加载。

trans-unit.source: Returns a <xref href="System.Xaml.XamlSchemaContext"></xref> object that represents the WPF schema context settings for a <xref href="System.Windows.Markup.XamlReader"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 返回<xref href="System.Xaml.XamlSchemaContext"></xref>对象，表示的 WPF 架构上下文设置<xref href="System.Windows.Markup.XamlReader"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Xaml.XamlSchemaContext"></xref> object that represents the WPF schema context settings for a <xref href="System.Windows.Markup.XamlReader"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Xaml.XamlSchemaContext"> </xref>对象，表示的 WPF 架构上下文设置<xref href="System.Windows.Markup.XamlReader"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Reads the XAML input in the specified <xref:System.IO.Stream> and returns an <xref:System.Object> that is the root of the corresponding object tree.
trans-unit.target: 读取中指定的 XAML 输入<xref:System.IO.Stream>并返回<xref:System.Object>，它是对应的对象树的根。</xref:System.Object> </xref:System.IO.Stream>

trans-unit.source: The XAML to load, in stream form.
trans-unit.target: 要加载，以流形式的 XAML。

trans-unit.source: The object at the root of the created object tree.
trans-unit.target: 创建的对象树的根处的对象。

trans-unit.source: stream is .
trans-unit.target: streamis .

trans-unit.source: Reads the XAML input through a provided <xref href="System.Xaml.XamlReader"></xref> and returns an object that is the root of the corresponding object tree.
trans-unit.target: 读取通过所提供的 XAML 输入<xref href="System.Xaml.XamlReader"></xref>并返回一个对象，它对应的对象树的根。

trans-unit.source: The input <xref:System.Xaml.XamlReader> can be <xref:System.Windows.Baml2006.Baml2006Reader>.
trans-unit.target: 输入<xref:System.Xaml.XamlReader>可以是<xref:System.Windows.Baml2006.Baml2006Reader>.</xref:System.Windows.Baml2006.Baml2006Reader> </xref:System.Xaml.XamlReader>

trans-unit.source: This is how you can load BAML at run time, or for localization tool purposes.
trans-unit.target: 这是如何加载 BAML 在运行时，或出于本地化工具目的。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Xaml.XamlReader"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Xaml.XamlReader"></xref> object.

trans-unit.source: This is expected to be initialized with input XAML.
trans-unit.target: 这需要使用输入的 XAML 初始化。

trans-unit.source: The object that is the root of the created object tree.
trans-unit.target: 创建的对象树的根对象。

trans-unit.source: reader is .
trans-unit.target: readeris .

trans-unit.source: Reads the XAML input in the specified <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader> and returns an object that is the root of the corresponding object tree.
trans-unit.target: 读取中指定的 XAML 输入<xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>并返回一个对象，它对应的对象树的根。</xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader> that has already loaded the XAML input to load in XML form.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>，已加载的 XAML 输入在 XML 窗体中加载。</xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>

trans-unit.source: The object that is the root of the created object tree.
trans-unit.target: 创建的对象树的根对象。

trans-unit.source: reader is .
trans-unit.target: readeris .

trans-unit.source: Reads the XAML input in the specified <xref:System.IO.Stream> and returns an object that is the root of the corresponding object tree.
trans-unit.target: 读取中指定的 XAML 输入<xref:System.IO.Stream>并返回一个对象，它对应的对象树的根。</xref:System.IO.Stream>

trans-unit.source: The stream that contains the XAML input to load.
trans-unit.target: 包含的 XAML 输入要加载的流。

trans-unit.source: Context information used by the parser.
trans-unit.target: 分析器使用的上下文信息。

trans-unit.source: The object that is the root of the created object tree.
trans-unit.target: 创建的对象树的根对象。

trans-unit.source: stream is .
trans-unit.target: streamis .

trans-unit.source: -or- parserContext is .
trans-unit.target: -or- parserContext is .

trans-unit.source: Reads the XAML input in the specified <xref:System.IO.Stream> and returns the root of the corresponding object tree.
trans-unit.target: 读取中指定的 XAML 输入<xref:System.IO.Stream>并返回相应的对象树的根。</xref:System.IO.Stream>

trans-unit.source: An asynchronous XAML load operation will initially return an object that is purely the root object.
trans-unit.target: 异步的 XAML 加载操作最初将返回一个对象，它只是根对象。

trans-unit.source: Asynchronously, XAML parsing then continues, and any child objects are filled in under the root.
trans-unit.target: 异步，XAML 分析然后仍然存在，并在根目录下填充任何子对象。

trans-unit.source: This is in contrast to the typical WPF XAML processing behavior and its interaction with WPF concepts of object lifetime.
trans-unit.target: 这是典型的 WPF XAML 处理行为和该产品与对象生存期 WPF 概念交互相反。

trans-unit.source: In the typical (non-async) interaction, all properties of an object including all child collections are filled before returning an element and reporting it as loaded.
trans-unit.target: 中的典型 （非异步） 交互，返回一个元素并将其加载汇报之前都是包括所有子集合对象的所有属性。

trans-unit.source: That behavior equates to a bottom-up methodology for creating the tree where the root object is the last object to become available.
trans-unit.target: 该行为等同于自下而上的方法，用于创建的树的根对象所在的最后一个对象变为可用。

trans-unit.source: You typically would assign the returned object to some location in your WPF application's object tree, with the knowledge that content might still be filling in and might cause incremental layout updates if the entire content is exposed as part of the UI.
trans-unit.target: 你通常会将返回的对象分配到 WPF 应用程序的对象树中的某个位置、 内容所知识可能仍会填入和如果作为 UI 的一部分公开的整个内容，则可能会导致增量布局更新。

trans-unit.source: For this reason it is typical to isolate or virtualize any asynchronously loaded objects from XAML, and to use application-specific logic or application state to notify when <xref:System.Windows.Markup.XamlReader.LoadCompleted> is handled.
trans-unit.target: 为此，它是典型隔离或虚拟化从 XAML，任何以异步方式加载的对象并使用特定于应用程序逻辑或应用程序状态通知时<xref:System.Windows.Markup.XamlReader.LoadCompleted>处理。</xref:System.Windows.Markup.XamlReader.LoadCompleted>

trans-unit.source: In order for LoadAsync to load XAML input asynchronously, the root element in the XAML input must contain the attribute and value `x:SynchronousMode="Async"`.
trans-unit.target: 按 LoadAsync 以异步方式加载的 XAML 输入中 XAML 的根元素的顺序输入必须包含的属性和值`x:SynchronousMode="Async"`。

trans-unit.source: The value is treated as case sensitive.
trans-unit.target: 值被视为区分大小写。

trans-unit.source: If the XAML input root does not contain `x:SynchronousMode="Async"`, no exception is thrown, and the call is processed as a synchronous load (see <xref:System.Windows.Markup.XamlReader.Load%28System.IO.Stream%29>).
trans-unit.target: 如果 XAML 输入的根不包含`x:SynchronousMode="Async"`，不会引发异常，且调用处理为同步负载 (请参阅<xref:System.Windows.Markup.XamlReader.Load%28System.IO.Stream%29>)。</xref:System.Windows.Markup.XamlReader.Load%28System.IO.Stream%29>

trans-unit.source: Only one asynchronous load operation per instance of the <xref:System.Windows.Markup.XamlReader> class can be performed at a time.
trans-unit.target: 每个实例只有一个异步加载操作<xref:System.Windows.Markup.XamlReader>类可以执行一次。</xref:System.Windows.Markup.XamlReader>

trans-unit.source: If more than one asynchronous operation is attempted on the same instance of the <xref:System.Windows.Markup.XamlReader> class an <xref:System.InvalidOperationException> is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 如果多个异步操作，将尝试对同一个实例<xref:System.Windows.Markup.XamlReader>类<xref:System.InvalidOperationException>引发。</xref:System.InvalidOperationException> </xref:System.Windows.Markup.XamlReader>

trans-unit.source: The stream containing the XAML input to load.
trans-unit.target: 包含的 XAML 输入要加载的流。

trans-unit.source: The object that is the root of the created object tree.
trans-unit.target: 创建的对象树的根对象。

trans-unit.source: stream is .
trans-unit.target: streamis .

trans-unit.source: Multiple load operations are pending concurrently with the same <xref href="System.Windows.Markup.XamlReader"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 多个负载操作处于挂起状态对同一个<xref href="System.Windows.Markup.XamlReader"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Reads the XAML input in the specified <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader> and returns the root of the corresponding object tree.
trans-unit.target: 读取中指定的 XAML 输入<xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>并返回相应的对象树的根。</xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>

trans-unit.source: An asynchronous XAML load operation will initially return an object that is purely the root object.
trans-unit.target: 异步的 XAML 加载操作最初将返回一个对象，它只是根对象。

trans-unit.source: Asynchronously, XAML parsing then continues, and any child objects are filled in under the root.
trans-unit.target: 异步，XAML 分析然后仍然存在，并在根目录下填充任何子对象。

trans-unit.source: This is in contrast to the typical WPF XAML processing behavior and its interaction with WPF concepts of object lifetime.
trans-unit.target: 这是典型的 WPF XAML 处理行为和该产品与对象生存期 WPF 概念交互相反。

trans-unit.source: In the typical (non-async) interaction, all properties of an object including all child collections are filled before returning an element and reporting it as loaded.
trans-unit.target: 中的典型 （非异步） 交互，返回一个元素并将其加载汇报之前都是包括所有子集合对象的所有属性。

trans-unit.source: That behavior equates to a bottom-up methodology for creating the tree where the root object is the last object to become available.
trans-unit.target: 该行为等同于自下而上的方法，用于创建的树的根对象所在的最后一个对象变为可用。

trans-unit.source: You typically would assign the returned object from LoadAsync to some location in your application's object tree, with the knowledge that content might still be filling in and might cause incremental layout updates if the entire content is exposed as part of the UI.
trans-unit.target: 你通常将返回的对象将从分配 LoadAsync 到应用程序的对象树中的某个位置、 内容所知识可能仍会填入和如果作为 UI 的一部分公开的整个内容，则可能会导致增量布局更新。

trans-unit.source: For this reason it is typical to isolate or virtualize any asynchronously loaded objects from XAML, and to use application-specific logic or application state to notify when <xref:System.Windows.Markup.XamlReader.LoadCompleted> is handled.
trans-unit.target: 为此，它是典型隔离或虚拟化从 XAML，任何以异步方式加载的对象并使用特定于应用程序逻辑或应用程序状态通知时<xref:System.Windows.Markup.XamlReader.LoadCompleted>处理。</xref:System.Windows.Markup.XamlReader.LoadCompleted>

trans-unit.source: In order for LoadAsync to load XAML input asynchronously, the root element in the XAML markup must contain the attribute and value `x:SynchronousMode="Async"`.
trans-unit.target: 为了使 LoadAsync 加载 XAML 输入以异步方式，在 XAML 标记中的根元素必须包含的属性和值`x:SynchronousMode="Async"`。

trans-unit.source: The value is treated as case sensitive.
trans-unit.target: 值被视为区分大小写。

trans-unit.source: If the XAML markup root does not contain `x:SynchronousMode="Async"`, no exception is thrown, and the call is instead processed as a synchronous load (see <xref:System.Windows.Markup.XamlReader.Load%28System.Xml.XmlReader%29>).
trans-unit.target: 如果 XAML 标记根不包含`x:SynchronousMode="Async"`，不会引发异常，且调用改为处理为同步负载 (请参阅<xref:System.Windows.Markup.XamlReader.Load%28System.Xml.XmlReader%29>)。</xref:System.Windows.Markup.XamlReader.Load%28System.Xml.XmlReader%29>

trans-unit.source: Only one asynchronous load operation per instance of the <xref:System.Windows.Markup.XamlReader> class can be performed at a time.
trans-unit.target: 每个实例只有一个异步加载操作<xref:System.Windows.Markup.XamlReader>类可以执行一次。</xref:System.Windows.Markup.XamlReader>

trans-unit.source: If more than one asynchronous operation is attempted on the same instance of the <xref:System.Windows.Markup.XamlReader> class an <xref:System.InvalidOperationException> is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 如果多个异步操作，将尝试对同一个实例<xref:System.Windows.Markup.XamlReader>类<xref:System.InvalidOperationException>引发。</xref:System.InvalidOperationException> </xref:System.Windows.Markup.XamlReader>

trans-unit.source: An existing <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader> that has already loaded/read the XAML input.
trans-unit.target: 现有<xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>，具有已加载/读取 XAML 输入。</xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>

trans-unit.source: The root of the created object tree.
trans-unit.target: 创建的对象树的根。

trans-unit.source: reader is .
trans-unit.target: readeris .

trans-unit.source: Multiple load operations are performed concurrently with the same <xref href="System.Windows.Markup.XamlReader"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 多个负载操作执行对同一个<xref href="System.Windows.Markup.XamlReader"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Reads the XAML input in the specified <xref:System.IO.Stream> and returns the root of the corresponding object tree.
trans-unit.target: 读取中指定的 XAML 输入<xref:System.IO.Stream>并返回相应的对象树的根。</xref:System.IO.Stream>

trans-unit.source: An asynchronous XAML load operation will initially return an object that is purely the root object.
trans-unit.target: 异步的 XAML 加载操作最初将返回一个对象，它只是根对象。

trans-unit.source: Asynchronously, XAML parsing then continues, and any child objects are filled in under the root.
trans-unit.target: 异步，XAML 分析然后仍然存在，并在根目录下填充任何子对象。

trans-unit.source: This is in contrast to the typical WPF XAML processing behavior and its interaction with WPF concepts of object lifetime.
trans-unit.target: 这是典型的 WPF XAML 处理行为和该产品与对象生存期 WPF 概念交互相反。

trans-unit.source: In the typical (non-async) interaction, all properties of an object including all child collections are filled before returning an element and reporting it as loaded.
trans-unit.target: 中的典型 （非异步） 交互，返回一个元素并将其加载汇报之前都是包括所有子集合对象的所有属性。

trans-unit.source: That behavior equates to a bottom-up methodology for creating the tree where the root object is the last object to become available.
trans-unit.target: 该行为等同于自下而上的方法，用于创建的树的根对象所在的最后一个对象变为可用。

trans-unit.source: You typically would assign the returned object to some location in your application's object tree, with the knowledge that content might still be filling in and might cause incremental layout updates if the entire content is exposed as part of the UI.
trans-unit.target: 你通常会将返回的对象分配到应用程序的对象树中的某个位置、 内容所知识可能仍会填入和如果作为 UI 的一部分公开的整个内容，则可能会导致增量布局更新。

trans-unit.source: For this reason it is typical to isolate or virtualize any asynchronously loaded objects from XAML, and to use application-specific logic or application state to notify when <xref:System.Windows.Markup.XamlReader.LoadCompleted> is handled.
trans-unit.target: 为此，它是典型隔离或虚拟化从 XAML，任何以异步方式加载的对象并使用特定于应用程序逻辑或应用程序状态通知时<xref:System.Windows.Markup.XamlReader.LoadCompleted>处理。</xref:System.Windows.Markup.XamlReader.LoadCompleted>

trans-unit.source: In order for LoadAsync to load markup asynchronously, the root element in the XAML markup must contain the attribute and value `x:SynchronousMode="Async"`.
trans-unit.target: 为了使 LoadAsync 来以异步方式加载标记，在 XAML 标记中的根元素必须包含的属性和值`x:SynchronousMode="Async"`。

trans-unit.source: The value is treated as case sensitive.
trans-unit.target: 值被视为区分大小写。

trans-unit.source: If the XAML markup root does not contain `x:SynchronousMode="Async"`, no exception is thrown, and the call is processed as a synchronous load (see <xref:System.Windows.Markup.XamlReader.Load%28System.IO.Stream%2CSystem.Windows.Markup.ParserContext%29>).
trans-unit.target: 如果 XAML 标记根不包含`x:SynchronousMode="Async"`，不会引发异常，且调用处理为同步负载 (请参阅<xref:System.Windows.Markup.XamlReader.Load%28System.IO.Stream%2CSystem.Windows.Markup.ParserContext%29>)。</xref:System.Windows.Markup.XamlReader.Load%28System.IO.Stream%2CSystem.Windows.Markup.ParserContext%29>

trans-unit.source: Only one asynchronous load operation per instance of the <xref:System.Windows.Markup.XamlReader> class can be performed at a time.
trans-unit.target: 每个实例只有一个异步加载操作<xref:System.Windows.Markup.XamlReader>类可以执行一次。</xref:System.Windows.Markup.XamlReader>

trans-unit.source: If more than one asynchronous operation is attempted on the same instance of the <xref:System.Windows.Markup.XamlReader> class an <xref:System.InvalidOperationException> is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 如果多个异步操作，将尝试对同一个实例<xref:System.Windows.Markup.XamlReader>类<xref:System.InvalidOperationException>引发。</xref:System.InvalidOperationException> </xref:System.Windows.Markup.XamlReader>

trans-unit.source: A stream containing the XAML input to load.
trans-unit.target: 包含的 XAML 输入要加载的流。

trans-unit.source: Context information used by the parser.
trans-unit.target: 分析器使用的上下文信息。

trans-unit.source: The root of the created object tree.
trans-unit.target: 创建的对象树的根。

trans-unit.source: stream is .
trans-unit.target: streamis .

trans-unit.source: Multiple load operations are performed concurrently with the same <xref href="System.Windows.Markup.XamlReader"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 多个负载操作执行对同一个<xref href="System.Windows.Markup.XamlReader"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when an asynchronous load operation completes.
trans-unit.target: 当异步加载操作完成时发生。

trans-unit.source: LoadCompleted is also raised when an asynchronous load operation aborts.
trans-unit.target: 当异步加载操作中止时，也会引发 LoadCompleted。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Reads the XAML input in the specified text string and returns an object that corresponds to the root of the specified markup.
trans-unit.target: 读取指定的文本字符串中的 XAML 输入并返回与指定标记的根对应的对象。

trans-unit.source: The implementation calls <xref:System.Windows.Markup.XamlReader.Load%2A> internally after creating a stream from the string.
trans-unit.target: 实现调用<xref:System.Windows.Markup.XamlReader.Load%2A>内部后从字符串创建流。</xref:System.Windows.Markup.XamlReader.Load%2A>

trans-unit.source: See <xref:System.Windows.Markup.XamlReader.Load%2A> for additional information such as possible exceptions.
trans-unit.target: 请参阅<xref:System.Windows.Markup.XamlReader.Load%2A>有关其他信息，例如可能的异常。</xref:System.Windows.Markup.XamlReader.Load%2A>

trans-unit.source: The input XAML, as a single text string.
trans-unit.target: 输入 XAML，单个文本字符串形式。

trans-unit.source: The root of the created object tree.
trans-unit.target: 创建的对象树的根。

trans-unit.source: Reads the XAML markup in the specified text string (using a specified <xref href="System.Windows.Markup.ParserContext"></xref>) and returns an object that corresponds to the root of the specified markup.
trans-unit.target: 读取指定的文本字符串中的 XAML 标记 (使用指定<xref href="System.Windows.Markup.ParserContext"> </xref>) 并将对应的对象返回到指定的标记的根。

trans-unit.source: The implementation calls <xref:System.Windows.Markup.XamlReader.Load%2A> internally after creating a stream from the string.
trans-unit.target: 实现调用<xref:System.Windows.Markup.XamlReader.Load%2A>内部后从字符串创建流。</xref:System.Windows.Markup.XamlReader.Load%2A>

trans-unit.source: See <xref:System.Windows.Markup.XamlReader.Load%2A> for additional information such as possible exceptions.
trans-unit.target: 请参阅<xref:System.Windows.Markup.XamlReader.Load%2A>有关其他信息，例如可能的异常。</xref:System.Windows.Markup.XamlReader.Load%2A>

trans-unit.source: The input XAML, as a single text string.
trans-unit.target: 输入 XAML，单个文本字符串形式。

trans-unit.source: Context information used by the parser.
trans-unit.target: 分析器使用的上下文信息。

trans-unit.source: The root of the created object tree.
trans-unit.target: 创建的对象树的根。
